00070 static DdNode * addDoIthBit ARGS((DdManager *dd, DdNode *f, DdNode *index));

00088 DdNode *
00089 Cudd_addFindMax(
00090   DdManager * dd,
00091   DdNode * f)
00092 {
00093     DdNode *t, *e, *res;
00094 
00095     if (cuddIsConstant(f)) {
00096         return(f);
00097     }
00098 
00099     res = cuddCacheLookup1(dd,Cudd_addFindMax,f);
00100     if (res != NULL) {
00101         return(res);
00102     }
00103 
00104     t  = Cudd_addFindMax(dd,cuddT(f));
00105     if (t == DD_PLUS_INFINITY(dd)) return(t);
00106 
00107     e  = Cudd_addFindMax(dd,cuddE(f));
00108 
00109     res = (cuddV(t) >= cuddV(e)) ? t : e;
00110 
00111     cuddCacheInsert1(dd,Cudd_addFindMax,f,res);
00112 
00113     return(res);
00114 
00115 } /* end of Cudd_addFindMax */
00116 
00117 
00127 DdNode *
00128 Cudd_addFindMin(
00129   DdManager * dd,
00130   DdNode * f)
00131 {
00132     DdNode *t, *e, *res;
00133 
00134     if (cuddIsConstant(f)) {
00135         return(f);
00136     }
00137 
00138     res = cuddCacheLookup1(dd,Cudd_addFindMin,f);
00139     if (res != NULL) {
00140         return(res);
00141     }
00142 
00143     t  = Cudd_addFindMin(dd,cuddT(f));
00144     if (t == DD_MINUS_INFINITY(dd)) return(t);
00145 
00146     e  = Cudd_addFindMin(dd,cuddE(f));
00147 
00148     res = (cuddV(t) <= cuddV(e)) ? t : e;
00149 
00150     cuddCacheInsert1(dd,Cudd_addFindMin,f,res);
00151 
00152     return(res);
00153 
00154 } /* end of Cudd_addFindMin */

00175 DdNode *
00176 Cudd_addIthBit(
00177   DdManager * dd,
00178   DdNode * f,
00179   int  bit)
00180 {
00181     DdNode *res;
00182     DdNode *index;
00183     
00184     /* Use a constant node to remember the bit, so that we can use the
00185     ** global cache.
00186     */
00187     index = cuddUniqueConst(dd,(CUDD_VALUE_TYPE) bit);
00188     if (index == NULL) return(NULL);
00189     cuddRef(index);
00190 
00191     do {
00192         dd->reordered = 0;
00193         res = addDoIthBit(dd, f, index);
00194     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00195 
00196     if (res == NULL) {
00197         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, index);
00198         return(NULL);
00199     }
00200     cuddRef(res);
00201     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, index);
00202     cuddDeref(res);
00203     return(res);
00204 
00205 } /* end of Cudd_addIthBit */

00230 static DdNode *
00231 addDoIthBit(
00232   DdManager * dd,
00233   DdNode * f,
00234   DdNode * index)
00235 {
00236     DdNode *res, *T, *E;
00237     DdNode *fv, *fvn;
00238     int mask, value;
00239     int v;
00240 
00241     /* Check terminal case. */
00242     if (cuddIsConstant(f)) {
00243         mask = 1 << ((int) cuddV(index));
00244         value = (int) cuddV(f);
00245         return((value & mask) == 0 ? DD_ZERO(dd) : DD_ONE(dd));
00246     }
00247 
00248     /* Check cache. */
00249     res = cuddCacheLookup2(dd,addDoIthBit,f,index);
00250     if (res != NULL) return(res);
00251 
00252     /* Recursive step. */
00253     v = f->index;
00254     fv = cuddT(f); fvn = cuddE(f);
00255 
00256     T = addDoIthBit(dd,fv,index);
00257     if (T == NULL) return(NULL);
00258     cuddRef(T);
00259 
00260     E = addDoIthBit(dd,fvn,index);
00261     if (E == NULL) {
00262         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, T);
00263         return(NULL);
00264     }
00265     cuddRef(E);
00266 
00267     res = (T == E) ? T : cuddUniqueInter(dd,v,T,E);
00268     if (res == NULL) {
00269         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, T);
00270         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, E);
00271         return(NULL);
00272     }
00273     cuddDeref(T);
00274     cuddDeref(E);
00275 
00276     /* Store result. */
00277     cuddCacheInsert2(dd,addDoIthBit,f,index,res);
00278 
00279     return(res);
00280 
00281 } /* end of addDoIthBit */
